Package com.epam.dataaccess.dao

Interface UserDAO

All Superinterfaces:
DAO<User>
All Known Implementing Classes:
UserDAOMariaDB
public interface UserDAO extends DAO<User>
DAO interface for managing User entities. Contains methods to access the persistence layer.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hrebenozhko Ruslan

  • Method Details

    • getSalt

      String getSalt(String login) throws DAOException
      Retrieves the salt of a user with the given login.
      Parameters:
      login - The login of the user.
      Returns:
      The salt needed for hashing.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • getUser

      User getUser(String login, String password) throws DAOException
      Retrieves the user with the given login and password, if it exists.
      Parameters:
      login - The login of the user.
      password - The password (hashed) of the user.
      Returns:
      The User entity.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • changeBlocked

      int changeBlocked(boolean blocked, int id) throws DAOException
      Changes the blocked status of a user.
      Parameters:
      blocked - The new blocked status (true = blocked, false = unblocked).
      id - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      0 if the status was not changed, 1 if the status was changed.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • addTariffToUser

      void addTariffToUser(int userId, int tariffId) throws DAOException
      Adds a record to the "user has tariff" table.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      tariffId - The ID of the tariff.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • removeTariffFromUser

      int removeTariffFromUser(int userId, int tariffId) throws DAOException
      Removes a record from the "user has tariff" table.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      tariffId - The ID of the tariff.
      Returns:
      0 if the record was not deleted, 1 if the record was deleted.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • getAllSubscriber

      List<User> getAllSubscriber() throws DAOException
      Retrieves a list of all users with the role of "subscriber."
      Returns:
      All users with the role of "subscriber."
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • getAllUnblockedSubscriber

      List<User> getAllUnblockedSubscriber() throws DAOException
      Retrieves a list of all subscribers who have an unblocked status.
      Returns:
      A list of all unblocked subscribers.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • getSubscriberForCharging

      List<User> getSubscriberForCharging() throws DAOException
      Retrieves a list of subscribers who have an unblocked status and have a tariff with days until next payment equal to 0.
      Returns:
      A list of subscribers who need to be charged.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • getSubscriberForView

      List<User> getSubscriberForView(String searchField, int offset, int entriesPerPage) throws DAOException
      Retrieves a filtered list of subscribers for view, with pagination.
      Parameters:
      searchField - A part of the login to filter subscribers.
      offset - The offset of the records.
      entriesPerPage - The number of records to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A filtered list of subscribers.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • getSubscriberNumber

      int getSubscriberNumber(String searchField) throws DAOException
      Retrieves the number of subscribers that contain a certain login part.
      Parameters:
      searchField - A part of the login to filter subscribers.
      Returns:
      The number of subscribers that contain the specified login part.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • changePassword

      int changePassword(int userId, String newPassword, String salt) throws DAOException
      Updates a user's password and salt in the persistence layer.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user to update.
      newPassword - The new hashed password.
      salt - The salt used to hash the password.
      Returns:
      1 if the password is successfully changed, otherwise 0.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • changePassword

      int changePassword(String email, String newPassword, String salt) throws DAOException
      Updates a user's password and salt in the persistence layer.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user to update.
      newPassword - The new hashed password.
      salt - The salt used to hash the password.
      Returns:
      1 if the password is successfully changed, otherwise 0.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • getUserStatus

      boolean getUserStatus(int userId) throws DAOException
      Retrieves the blocked status of a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user to retrieve the status for.
      Returns:
      True if the user is blocked, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a SQL exception occurs.

    • getLoginByEmail

      String getLoginByEmail(String email) throws DAOException
      Retrieves the login of a user based on their email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user to retrieve the login for.
      Returns:
      The login of the user.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If a SQL exception occurs.
